name: Szpieg
description:
An atmospheric first person game stretching the bitsy engine to its limits by using aloelazoe's 3d bitsy editor. This game sets you in Lublin, Poland, in 1956, right in the middle of Communist repression. Explore your world, talk to people off the street, interact with objects, and enjoy a linear story involving revenge.

This game was made for a final assignment at my University. Made by Andrew Braunschweig for the Game Jam #3 final project in ENGL 298, Professor Salvatore Pane.
